title: Winter
description: This cheerful beginning reader introduces students to all the fun things many people associate with winter. Ice skates, snowmen, mittens, and a warm fire are all represented by simple illustrations and one-to-one picture correspondence.
reviewWords: coat, fire, ice skates, mittens, sled, snow, snowman, winter
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify the main idea of the book and list details that support the main idea
awareness: Initial Sound                : Orally discriminate initial sounds
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Ww with the /w/ sound
grammar: Nouns                : Recognize that some words name things
wordWork: Antonyms                : List words that mean the opposite
